form.SN:
v ameriški angleščini pišemo
rivaling, rivaled
.

sense.def:
One's rival
je oseba, s katero nekdo tekmuje.

seg.quote: His newspaper outstripped its rivals in circulation.
Fighting broke out between rival groups.

sense.def:
Kadar ena stvar
rivals another
, sta obe enake kakovosti ali ustrezata enakim merilom.

seg.quote: Of all the flowers in the garden few can rival the lily.
